properties.name: rest.security.jwt.refresh-token-exp-time
properties.description: {@link JwtToken} can be refreshed during this timeframe.

properties.name: rest.security.jwt.token-expiration-time
properties.description: {@link JwtToken} will expire after this time.

properties.name: rest.security.jwt.token-signing-key
properties.description: Key is used to sign {@link JwtToken}.

properties.name: rest.security.web.path-wihtout-auth
properties.description: {@link WebSettings} Path sin restriccion de acceso por autenticacion.

properties.name: rest.security.web.token-based-auth-entry-point
properties.description: {@link WebSettings} Path con restriccion de acceso por autenticacion con token valido.
